extendedInfo.description: Play the gritty Vampire adventure game from world renowned developer Spacetime Studios â creators of the smash hit Pocket Legends. YOU are an immortal Vampire with fangs, super speed, and hundreds of weapons to slay demons, werewolves, and warlocks. MMORPG.com: Best of Game Developers Conference 2012http://www.mmorpg.com/showFeature.cfm/loadFeature/6177/page/1âBuckets of blood, darker environments, and vampires that arenât afraid to show some skin.â - 148 AppsâSame game on your Android-powered smartphone or tablet, your Mac, and your PC!â â Pocket GamerâThird Legends title is a major evolution in casual and avid gameplay.â â Indie Gamer NewsDark Legends is a free Vampire horror adventure and 3D Massively-Multiplayer Online Role Playing Game (MMORPG). In this bloody addition to Spacetime Studiosâ Legends games, Vampires have been hunted to the brink of extinction by human supremacists that have called on evil supernatural creatures for help. YOU are the last line of defense and will undertake missions for the Vampire Nation to dominate or utterly destroy your enemies.Play online with millions of other Vampires in fast-paced Co-Op or PVP action. As you slay your foes, you will unlock Vampire Powers that suit your play style and find rare treasures and gear. As your Vampire powers grow and you collect more powerful gear, you will be able to take on the most powerful threats: the Hunters. Features:+  Free to play forever+  Unlock Special Vampire Powers  +  Thousands of Weapons, Items, and Gear+  Multiplayer & Solo â Play in Co-Op, PVP, or Solo Mode+  Worldwide MMORPG â Play with Millions Online+  Plays Across Wi-Fi, Edge, 3G or 4G Networks  Check Us Out At:www.DarkLegends.comWant More Info? Visit our Forum!www.spacetimestudios.com/forum.phpDeveloperâs website:www.spacetimestudios.com

reviews.title: Rpg; a rare find
reviews.comment: Games like this are slim to nearly impossible to find. This does have the annoying pay to play function (platinum costs real money) but you can play effectively without it. Fun, you will sign in daily for dungeon runs and if you find yourself at an impasse, ask others for help defeating a boss and you\'ll be happily surprised..
